column2: The two lights of Old North Church

Two lights have recently been spotted shining in the steeple of Boston's Old North Church, one of the few pre-cataclysmic churches still standing. There's an ancient tale about that, but I can't remember what it is...
It was just a children's story, anyways.

A fleet has appeared in Cape Cod, full of men wearing red jackets. They claim to have sailed from the far side of the ocean, and seek to bring the world we know under the rule of 'the one we call Queen, for human mouths cannot voice her true name'.
Ia! Ia! On her throne in the White Hall, the Queen yet dreams.
More troops have sailed from that dark land across the sea, to strengthen the Redcoats here.
Following years of conquest, the faith of locals has become the faith of the British occupiers.
At least there'll be no more sacrifices now.
The Redcoats turn to the High Church
Due to the influence of local adherents, the British have returned to the Christian faith of their ancestors.
At least there'll be no more sacrifices now.
Hordes of perfidious Brits have put the capital of Old America to the torch!
I hope our realm isn't next...
The Redcoats turn to the Occult!
Following years of conquest, the faith of locals has become the faith of the British occupiers.
I'm not sure this is an improvement.
Moved by the onslaught of the British, men from across America have banded together to form the Minutemen, a new organization dedicated to fighting the British.
Oh, I'm shaking in my boots!

News and refugees from the south bring tidings of fire and death, tales of an almighty empire that has tamed the fearsome Amazon, smashed the strongest kingdoms of the far south, and now turns its gaze northward. Survivors have streamed from the jungles by land and sea, and all tell a similar story of a land named Brazil that presents all peoples before it with a choice: bend the knee, or face total annihilation, which they bring to their challengers with terrifying weapons and beasts of war. It is said they have recently brought low the mighty kingdom of Panama with their numberless armies, and could continue their advance at any moment...
A thrilling story, but nothing could breach the jungle!

My liege, limitless hordes of southron warriors are pouring out from the jungle! Arriving in Bluefields, Matagalpa and Chinandega, the heathens march under the banner of Brazil, and have proclaimed their intent to force all civilized lands from Miskito to the Arctic under their yoke!
For the Emperor and Olodumare, all the northern rabble shall taste the sword and the fire!
Let the jungle-dwellers kill each other off, it doesn't concern us.
Saints preserve us! To arms, to arms!
Brazil has called more hordes from the dark south, strengthening their ranks even further.
The great [Root.GetTitledName] and all [Root.GetHerHis] vassals have converted and embraced the faith of the Falling Star.
The great [Root.GetTitledName] and all [Root.GetHerHis] vassals have converted and embraced the pantheon of the Sacred Heart.

A prophet has arisen, proclaiming that the Old World was struck down, not by Jesus, the Atom, or the Founding Fathers, but by the Almighty Dollar for neglecting the temples they called Malls, improperly performing the ritual of the Shopping, and not giving Him tribute for every new Product he created, and that He will soon destroy the world again unless all Americans follow these rites. Many have came before him, preaching similar doctrines but attracting few followers, for the ruins of Old America are littered with books and signs advertising marvelous products that will cure all ills and bring true happiness. But this prophet's oratory has given him tens of thousands of followers, who are now spreading their faith across America by his words and by the sword.

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Founders. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. With codified rites, a holy scripture and a strict church hierarchy under a single leader, they hope that the reformed [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is better armed to fight back against the weak and effeminate foreign beliefs!
The old ways are still best
column3: Les vieilles mœurs valent toujours mieux
column4: Die alten Pfade sind immernoch die besten
column6: Las viejas formas aún son mejores

column2: President [FromFrom.GetFirstName] [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] has passed into the great white house in the sky, and a new President must be elected to lead the faithful.
I will not contest this election
Your campaign for President did not gather enough support to contest the election.
The candidates for the Presidency have been announced.
The exalted office of the Presidency stands vacant. A new President must be elected to lead the faithful.
It is time to cast your vote for the next President of the United States.
The Founding Fathers have seen fit to grant me the exalted office of President of the United States.
The Founding Fathers have spoken through the voice of the American people, anointing [From.GetFullName] as President of the United States, Commander-in-Chief, and Leader of the Free World.
will be our choice for President\n
You are a candidate for President\n
Any Presidential candidate must be a capable American at least thirty-five years of age.
This character is a candidate for the Presidency.
This character is a candidate for the Presidency.
This character is a candidate for the Presidency.
This character is a candidate for the Presidency.
The Americanist Liberation War Era has Begun\n

column6: La ira de los antiguos dioses

column2: In response to the new era of Crusades, the Great [Root.GetTitledName] has informed all [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.GetPossPronoun] plans for a magnificent [Root.Religion.GetName] Pagan response. In fact, all pagan heads of religion may now declare Great Holy Wars. This could be the beginning of unprecedented Heathen aggression.
column3: En réponse à la nouvelle ère des croisades et des jihads impliquant les monothéistes abrahamiques, le grand [Root.GetTitledName] a informé tous les [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s de religion [Root.Religion.GetName] de son grandiose projet [Root.Religion.GetName]. De fait, tous les chefs des religions païennes peuvent désormais déclarer des guerres saintes. C'est peut-être le début d'une agression païenne sans précédent.
column4: Als Antwort auf das neue Zeitalter der Kreuzzüge und des Dschihad unter den abrahamischen Monotheisten hat der Große [Root.GetTitledName] alle[Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] von [Root.GetPossPronoun] über seine Pläne für eine großartige [Root.Religion.GetName] heidnische Antwort unterrichtet. So können jetzt alle heidnischen Religionsführer ihren eigenen großen Heiligen Krieg erklären. Dies könnte der Anfang einer nie dagewesenen heidnischen Aggression sein.
column6: En respuesta a la nueva era de Cruzadas y Yihads entre los monoteístas abrahámicos, el Gran [Root.GetTitledName] ha informado a todos los [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s de [Root.Religion.GetName] de sus planes para desplegar una magnífica respuesta pagana de [Root.Religion.GetName]. De hecho, todas las cabezas religiosas paganas pueden ahora declarar Grandes Guerras Santas. Este hecho podría ser el comienzo de una agresión pagana sin precedentes.

column2: Lock up your son and daughter!
column3: Protégez vos fils et vos filles !
column4: Sperren Eure Söhne und Töchter weg!
column6: ¡Encierra a tu hijo e hija bajo llave!

column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to become President of the United States.

For too long, Americans have lived under the rule of tyrants who reject the wisdom of the Founders and worship monstrosities, rust, or men with oversized hats. President [Root.GetFullName] cannot simply stand by and watch as the oppressors take away the rights of Americans and refuse to honor the Flag, and [Root.GetSheHe] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The great city of Washington has fallen into the hands of un-American tyrants. The oppressors are burning the temples of the Founders, defiling their graves, destroying the holy documents, and fluoridating the Potomac River. In response, President [Root.GetFullName] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The great cities of America have fallen into the hands of un-American tyrants. The oppressors will not stop until they have destroyed every remaining bastion of freedom. President [Root.GetFullName] cannot allow that to happen, and [Root.GetSheHe] has issued an Executive Order requiring all able-bodied citizens to fight for the restoration of America.

The Christian population of Canada is divided between the High Church and the Ursuline See. If we control enough of the great cities of Canada, we can unify them into a single Confederated Church under our control. Our current [GetJobSpiritual] will become the first Prime Minister of the Church.

The Christians of Canada are no longer divided between the High Church and the Ursuline See. Thanks to the efforts of [From.GetTitledFirstName], the churches have been unified into the Confederated Church of Canada, headed by the Prime Minister in Ottawa, who will also serve as a secular advisor to the [From.GetTitle].
If that's the way the wind is blowing...
column3: Si c'est ainsi que le vent souffle...
column6: Si esto es la dirección que el viento está soplando ...

column2: I will never give up my faith!
column3: Jamais je ne renierai ma foi !
column4: Ich werde meinen Glauben niemals aufgeben!

column2: A small arena for chariot racing.
A medium-sized arena for chariot racing.
A great arena for chariot racing.
One of the largest chariot racetracks in all of the Americas.
This character is studying at a university.
This character has received a university education.
Which subjects will I study this year?
This character is in the business of loaning out substantial sums of gold to other rulers.
This character owes a debt to a bank.
Announce our willingness to loan out portions of our treasury to other rulers.
Stop lending money to others. This will not affect any loans we have already made.
Seek a loan from a banker at 25% interest. If we fail to repay them within five years, there may be dire consequences...
Pay back the debt we owe to the bankers.
Announce that we no longer intend to repay our current debts. This is a drastic decision, and our creditors will not take it lightly.
This character has earned the enmity of moneylenders everywhere by refusing to repay a loan.

[From.GetBestName] is seeking a five-year loan at 25% interest. If we pay one-fourth of the total, other lenders will finance the rest, and we will recieve one-fourth of the principal and interest when the loan is repaid.
[From.GetBestName] has agreed to underwrite our loan. Payment will be due in five years.
We could not find any bankers willing to work with us.
A loan will be due for repayment at the expiration date of this modifier.
column3: Un emprunt devra être remboursé à la date d'expiration.
column4: Ein Darlehn muss muss zur Zeit dieses Modifikators zurückgezahlt werden
column6: A loan will be due for repayment at the expiration date of this modifier.

column2: Our loan to [From.GetBestName] has come due.
Our loan from [From.GetBestName] has come due.
I have the money right here
I do not have the full amount, but I will pay the interest
The loan will be extended for two years
You shall not have a single coin from me!
Defaulting on a loan may have severe consequences...
[From.GetBestName] is unable to pay [From.GetHerHis] debt in full, but has paid interest in order to extend the loan for two years.
We'll get our money, one way or another

The ancient bridge at [From.Capital.GetName] has carried travellers across the river for as long as anyone can remember, bringing prosperity to the towns of [From.GetName]. Yesterday, as a caravan was crossing the river, the crumbling span gave way, and the traders plummeted into the water. The burghers are clamoring for a new crossing to be built, but to do so would require thousands of laborers and many tons of materials. Furthermore, since designing a bridge of this length is beyond the capabilities of even the best masons and carpenters in [From.GetName], we must find a master builder learned in the arts of Old World construction.
The Patrons of El Sagrado Corazón

Followers of the faith of the Sacred Heart- Sagrado Corazón- all adhere to one general creed, but tend to favor one specific saint within the Sacred Heart's pantheon. Although such patrons are often chosen early on in a follower's life, it's not unheard of for a person to change their patron or patroness later on.
I shall follow El Santo, the patron of warriors
Nuestra Señora, the Virgin of Guadalupe, is my patroness
I pray to Santa Muerte for a safe delivery to the Afterlife.
